mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT r.reviewno, r.contents, r.rating, r.rdate, s.title, m.memberno, m.nickname, COUNT(l.likesno) AS likes, COUNT(h.hatesno) AS hates FROM review r JOIN shoes s ON r.shoesno = s.shoesno JOIN member m ON r.memberno = m.memberno LEFT JOIN likes l ON r.reviewno = l.reviewno LEFT JOIN hates h ON r.reviewno = h.reviewno WHERE r.shoesno = 1 GROUP BY r.reviewno, r.contents, r.rating, r.rdate, s.title, m.memberno, m.nickname ORDER BY r.reviewno DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < = 5
SELECT r.reviewno, r.contents, r.rating, r.rdate, m.nickname FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.memberno = m.memberno WHERE r.shoesno = #{shoesno} ORDER BY r.rdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(reviewno, contents, rating, rdate, shoesno, memberno) VALUES(review_seq.nextval, #{contents}, #{rating}, sysdate, #{shoesno}, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review r JOIN shoes s ON s.shoesno = r.shoesno WHERE r.memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY rdate desc
